The show had been aired on October 27 and 29, 2018. The show will have further broadcasting in November and December.Chinese philanthropy is being increasingly integrated into the world. China's philanthropy is becoming the best bridge of China's culture to the world. As the China Global Television Network (CGTN) program, "China's 40 Years of Reform," presents the documentary about the Chinese philanthropy, charity, and social development in China, the world can understand better the history and the trend of the Chinese philanthropy.The CGTN program, "China's 40 Years of Reform," first launched in 2017 on the occasion of the 40th Anniversary of the Reform and Opening-up of China, and the first edition had been aired for over 400 times in 35 countries and regions with 44 languages. As the host of the China Global Television Network (CGTN), a member of the People's Daily Newspaper, and a member of the Communist Party of China, I had the honor and opportunity to interview and tell stories about the Chinese philanthropy, charity, and social development in China, which has been the best bridge for the Chinese culture to cross the world in the past forty years.The following is the Chinese introduction of this program. The Chinese name of the CGTN program is "China's 40 Years of Reform: The Communication of the Chinese Culture Through the Globalization." The English name of the program is "China's 40 Years of Reform: The Promotion of China's Culture in the World."

By zhangqi on Wed, 05/08/2013 - 17:33Dear Members of the China-Europa Forum,At the end of April 2013, the 3rd China-Europa Forum has been held in Tongji University in Shanghai. The title of the Forum was “How to Respond to Climate Change? A Reappraisal of the Development Model”. More than 100 people have participated in the Forum, 37 of them came from European countries including Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Belgium, Finland, Sweden, Greece, etc. More than 20 students, who study at the School of International Relations and Public Affairs at Tongji University, also attended the Forum. Prof. Zhang Haipeng, Director of School of International Relations and Public Affairs at Tongji University, warmly welcomed all the participants.The opening session was presided by Professor Zhang Haipeng, Director of the School of International Relations and Public Affairs at Tongji University. Professor Zhang delivered the keynote speech entitled “Responding to Climate Change: Tackling Common Challenges for European Countries and China”. He pointed out that Europe and China both aim at finding ways to respond to climate change. In order to implement this aim, one needs to take into account economic growth and environmental sustainability. In order to create such a model, one needs to find a way to deal with the global market economy.

. The news can be found all around the world and most of the Japanese newspaper.I am currently in Japan and I am planning to take the Shinkansen to Kyoto on 04 May 2011. According to your post above, it will be the end of Golden Week (not to be confused with the upcoming Golden Week from 02 – 05 May). I am a bit worried because I may encounter a lot of people taking the train at the same time and might miss the train to Kyoto. How should I deal with the crowd? Any help would be greatly appreciated.My advice is to get to the station early. The station will be quite crowded during golden week. But getting to the station early allows you to get through the crowd and get your ticket before everyone else starts lining up. Then you can get a seat (or at least find a good spot to stand with your luggage). If you are already in Tokyo, don’t leave home with too much luggage. It’s easy to forget how crowded Tokyo stations are.When I used to take the train during holidays, I always wanted to arrive 30 minutes earlier than usual because I would sometimes spend up to 10-15 minutes just lining up for my ticket (or the IC ticket machine).Oh I see. Thanks a lot for the advice! I was so worried since this is my first time in Japan, and the first time I travel alone… haha. Really appreciate the quick response! Six years after closing its bases in Okinawa, the U.S. military is moving to resume operations here. The U.S. Naval Forces Japan Public Affairs Office has confirmed that a new unit will be deployed at Kadena Air Base in October.Kadena AB is already home to some 2,500 Marines of the 3rd Marine Expeditionary Force.The new unit to be deployed will be “Combat Logistics Regiment 35.” The Navy Public Affairs Office says 260 Marines and 50 sailors will be moved to Okinawa, making a combined total of 3,000 troops on the island.The move of CLR 35 is a result of a new plan to reorganize all units of the 3rd Marine Expeditionary Force into “Special Operations Capable Forces.”According to the military spokesperson, the CLR will be fully capable of conducting all the missions of the Marine Air Ground Task Force in Okinawa, while maintaining the ability to deploy. The 3rd Marine Expeditionary Force will become a unit that is fully equipped with all arms necessary for combat operations.Opposition to the moves is expected from Okinawans, who have objected all along to the U.S. military having any presence on the island. A spokesman for Governor Keiichi Inamine says the new plans are clearly against the will of Okinawa, while a leading member of the Okinawa Prefecture Assembly says the news is clearly contrary to the Japan-U.S. Defense Facility Special Action Committee agreement.The new CLR 35 is part of the 3rd Marine Logistics Group, 3rd Marine Expeditionary Force, Fleet Marine Forces, Pacific.Source: http://www.okinawa.us.emb-japan.go.jp/en/news/top/03-23-2.htmS.

|The idea was for the students in the orchestra to learn not just music but also team spirit, discipline and responsibility. The project also encourages a sense of community and allows children to experience new cultures.A young girl in Ghana is overjoyed with the violin she's just been given. The instrument has been donated as part of the Sistema Scotland program. The violin arrived in the country, along with other instruments donated to the new project, on Tuesday.The young girl was lucky enough to be chosen as one of the first pupils to learn music through the Scottish version of Venezuela's National System of Youth and Children's Orchestras and Choirs, known as "El Sistema," which started in 1975 in the South American country and has now been copied worldwide.El Sistema Scotland is headed by James Boyd, a former pupil at a music school in England which inspired the Venezuelan project and which is now the model for the Scottish initiative. The project will initially provide violin lessons to 50 disadvantaged children in Raploch, Stirling.Funding and enthusiasmBoyd said that 40 million euros ($56 million) had been secured so far to fund the Scottish project."We will see the effect of El Sistema Scotland within a year or two," said Boyd. "The more we get together, the more we play together, the better off we all are in terms of understanding each other and working together. We're creating a new generation of musicians."Scottish First Minister Alex Salmond agreed with Boyd's views on the project."Music, culture, and creative learning is very important for young people," he told Deutsche Welle. "It helps to provide self-confidence, self-esteem and self-achievement, which is why we support the El Sistema Scotland project."Sir Roger Norrington, former musical director of the Scottish Chamber Orchestra, also welcomed the project."

The police spokesman Boy Rafli Amar thinks the suspect may be linked to Noordin Mohammed Top.D. The suicide bomb attack in July, which killed nine people, was organized by the suspect.E. The suspect has no links with any previous bombings in Indonesia.F. The suspect was arrested because he is believed to have links with Noordin Mohammed Top.

2009年11月3日德国之声中文广播晚间第二套节目新闻 | 德国之声 来自德国 介绍德国 | DW | 03.11.2009BBC NEWS | World | Europe | French far right on top in pollBBC NEWS | World | Europe | French far right on top in poll French far right on top in pollFar-right National Front leader Jean-Marie Le Pen says the global financial crisis is a 'global coup d'etat'Economic gloom is driving up the popularity of France's National Front party.An opinion poll for French radio, released on Sunday, showed the extreme-right party has the support of 13% of French voters.The poll follows gains made in recent elections in a number of towns around France, including the southern town of Beaucaire.The far-right is currently reaping the benefits of a rise in the French unemployment rate, analysts say.The opinion poll, taken by CSA for RTL radio and LCI television, showed the ruling UMP party would win 31% of votes, up from 30% in early August.But the centre-left Socialists saw their support drop to 20%, down from 21%, and the Communists saw their support drop to 4%, from 6%.The right-wing National Front party saw its rating go up by one point to 13%, while the far-left and environmentalists both had 3%.The poll surveyed 1,015 people and had a margin of error of 3%.Nearly 100 days into the global financial crisis, a National Front candidate was elected mayor in Beaucaire, in the south of France."

作者：Jeremy Hainsworth,Associated Press来源：[B][B]BBC[/B][/B] 2014-02-20 20:13:25.0KYIV, Ukraine - At least 25 people have died in clashes between police and protesters in the Ukrainian capital after opposition leaders appeared to reject a deal aimed at ending the country's protracted political crisis.The Health Ministry said 25 people died in the clashes Wednesday and 241 were injured. Earlier Thursday, Ukraine's Health Ministry reported a figure of 23 dead and 219 injured.Kiev's Independence Square was covered with smoke and flames Thursday morning, and the sound of gunfire and loudspeakers made it hard to estimate how many people were on the square.The protests have been going on for more than two months, triggered by President Viktor Yanukovych's decision to freeze ties with the European Union and seek a huge bailout from Russia.Most protesters in the square fled Wednesday as police advanced in a sweep and the death toll rose after hours of fighting in and around the sprawling square.The bodies of seven anti-government protesters were seen on a sidewalk outside Kiev's Hotel Ukraine as a fight raged with riot police in the lobby and a huge fire blazed in an upper story.Police armed with water cannon and stun grenades attacked hundreds of protesters.

During the summer, police killed two black men, Alton Sterling in Baton Rouge and Philando Castile in Minnesota, prompting Black Lives Matter protests and an international conversation about race, policing, and the American criminal justice system.This conversation continues after Dallas officers Lorne Ahrens, Michael Krol, Michael J. Smith, Brent Thompson and Patrick Zamarripa were shot during a peaceful protest against police brutality on July 7. The next day, police officers Matthew Gerald, Brad Garafola, and Montrell Jackson were killed in Baton Rouge.In both instances, the shooters were military veterans. In Dallas, the shooter reportedly told negotiators that he was “upset about Black Lives Matter” and “wanted to kill white people, especially white officers,” a senior law enforcement official told CNN. In Baton Rouge, the shooter left an internet trail that indicated anger at the police shootings of Alton Sterling and Philando Castile.This post shares the perspectives of Latino people in the United States in response to these events.Protests erupted throughout cities in the United States following the fatal shootings of Alton Sterling, 37, of Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and Philando Castile, 32, of Saint Paul, Minnesota. Image by flickr user: Mobilus In Mobili. CC BY-SA 2.0.The media attention given to the shootings of Sterling, Castile and other black victims, has raised the question of how these events are reported when the victim is Latino.Today I realized how my brown body can be perceived as threatening even when I am just going to work #PhilandoCastile #AltonSterling— Yadira Almanzar (@YadiraAlmanzar) July 7, 2016NBC’s report on the recent shooting of black victims by police, for example, did not mention any of the nine Latino men shot by police in the last year.

网http://mp3.cnr.cn/audio/20120531/916747841.mp3In April, the National Development and Reform Commission and the Ministry of Commerce jointly issued several directives on restricting the use of foreign-made products in the public procurement. It was then publicized by the media as the "Buy Chinese" policy. The German media were not happy about it. On the contrary, they were scared, because Germany's export to China in the first quarter was 32.7% less than the same period last year.As an export-oriented country, 40% of the German exports goes to China. When we hear "Buy Chinese," we don't just think of our loss of business in China; we worry about the entire German economy. This "China shock" has not happened, but we cannot ignore it. The fear of the German government and businesses about China's growing strength in the economy is inevitable, but it is necessary for us to understand the "Buy Chinese" policy from a different view.Germany is concerned that the "Buy Chinese" policy is another "made in China" slogan. But it is clear that this is a way to restrict the use of foreign-made products in public procurement, while it still allows companies to choose among domestic and foreign-made products. This is a policy to promote the healthy development of the domestic market, and it is not just a tool to promote "Made in China" or a "Buy Chinese" policy that favors local businesses.The "Buy Chinese" policy is beneficial to the German and European businesses. In March of this year, the State Development and Reform Commission issued the "Administrative Regulations on the Government Procurement of Domestic Products," which specifies the purchase of domestic software and IT products in government procurement. From the policy, we can see that it is also a part of China's indigenous innovation and the construction of independent core manufacturing technology and related software.

家: 意大利Michele Rizzi(意大利)与德国Friederike Plafki(德国).The project of a piece for 8 dancers in a scenic space is born from the awareness of a need to find a way to re-establish a connection with our most profound sense of humanity. It will use various styles and languages, and the research will be based on exploring the relationship with the space, the use of breath and the body’s energy as an unstoppable flow. The research will focus on discovering the most essential parts of the human condition, on the search for what unites us all as human beings. The dancers will explore different approaches towards the human condition, to discover how each one of us has a particular sense of the world, as it is filtered by our life experiences. The piece will use Taipei, the place where it will be developed and shown, as a further point of departure, and as a place of inspiration for our research.

*什么是双重危境* 美国宪法第五条修正案指出，任何人不得因同一罪行而两次遭受生命或身体的危害，也就是说不能因同一犯罪而受到两次审判，这就是人们常说的“双重危境条款”。双重危境原则植根于西方的法律制度，并且一直可以追溯到圣经的旧约世代，希伯来法律中有类似双重处罚的规定，到了希腊和罗马时代早期，双重危境原则开始形成，后来又成为英国普通法的一部份，并运用到英国在北美的殖民地。美国开国先贤在制定联邦宪法修正案时加入了有关条款。洛杉矶洛约拉法学院教授塞谬尔·皮尔斯伯里介绍了双重危境条款包括的内容：“如果审判以被告无罪释放告终，双重危境就很容易避免，因为不会出现进一步的诉讼，也不能对判决提出上诉。

在北海石油平台周围，已经有 5 个新的勘察钻井在运作。但是 RWE Dea 公司也积极地在陆地上寻找更多的油层。比如在下萨克森的吉弗恩以北大约150平方公里的范围以及在石勒苏益格 - 荷尔施泰因州普伦地区约400平方公里的大范围区域。类似这样的钻探不仅很昂贵，而且前景未卜。在德国这样的勘探成功率仅为40% 。仅仅钻井可能就要耗费近3000万欧元。此外还通常要为地震勘测耗费上千万欧元的资金。可以预料的是，原油的价格很快又会涨价到每吨600欧元以上。因此RWE Dea公司和其他能源公司在本国探寻原油时，都不会为高额的前期投入所吓倒。德里克·默舍尔总结说，尽管投资高昂，但从中期来看，这不会是一笔亏本的生意：“从这一点来看，我们可以做到效益经营。 ”由于有了新的开采技术，人们也需要考虑对现有的石油储备作重新估计。

他最近的贡献则包括参与梦想法案（DREAM Act）、AgJobs、CHIP及Violence Against Women Act的制订。他同样也致力于2007年闯关失败的全面移民改革案（Comprehensive Immigration Reform Bill），此法案奠基了新法案的雏形。CHIP和VAWA两个法案使得如今居住于美国的移民者能够得到社会帮助。而梦想法案及AgJobs则提供无身分 的移民者透过工作及教育计划取得公民权。甘乃迪显著的影响了移民改革的进程，历史上著名的移民权益政策组织还包括了National Council of La Raza、联合拉丁美洲联盟（League of United Latin American Citizens）以及Mexican-American Legal Defense and Education Fund。The National Council of La Raza在2009年9月7日劳工节发表了一份关于拉丁工人境遇的报告，揭露了一个冷酷的现实状况：薪水低、无津贴、工作环境危险以及高死亡率。Change.org有一位攥写贫困问题的博客Leigh Graham写道：「受到影响的多数为拉丁裔 」。

中国作为经济大国的崛起已经举世公认，而对于世界头号经济强国美国来说，如何维持和发展美中经贸关系，却是一个巨大的挑战。美国西蒙-舒斯特（Simon & Schuster)出版社新近出版的一本书专门探讨了美中经济如何融为一体以及为什么美中经济一体化对世界繁荣至关重要等问题。 这本书的题目是《超级融合：美中经济如何融为一体，为什么世界繁荣仰赖于它》(Superfusion: How China and America Became One Economy and Why the World's Prosperity Depends on It)，作者是扎卡里·卡拉贝尔( Zachary Karabell)。 卡拉贝尔认为，过去十多年来，中国经济和美国经济实际上已经变成了一个紧密交织的综合体系。两国如何打理这个体系将决定今后几十年全球会变得更加繁荣还是更加动荡。

“新冠疫苗；中国外交的新武器”，这是该报多名记者联合撰写的文章的标题。 该报记者注意到， 中国研发的疫苗正陆续运往一些国家.但这一次中国官方媒体显得十分低调，没有像年初的口罩外交那样高调渲染。这并不意味着没有疫苗外交。文章分析了这种谨慎的三大可能的理由。一是中国现代国际关系学院今年4月的一份报告承认，中国围绕口罩外交的宣传适得其反， 自1989年的天安门事件以后，中国的国际形象从未如此糟糕 。二是中国国内仍然不断有新增病例，优先将疫苗出口国外有可能令本国民众不满。三是中国体制不透明，公卫丑闻不断，缺乏信誉，中国因此希望谨慎前行。

1970 年和 1986 年举办过世界杯的墨西哥市奥林匹克体育场。照片来自 Flickr 用户djmfuentes (CC BY-NC 2.0)。部落格 El Universal 带我们看到民众如何在 1986 世界杯开幕式上炮轰当时的总统 Miguel de la Madrid。总统演讲中超过九万名观众愤怒叫嚣着，因为政府决定在距离 1985 年九月十九日墨西哥市大地震仅仅八个月后就主办世界杯赛事。1982 年当国际足总决定哥伦比亚不符主办资格后，墨西哥接过了主办 1986 世界杯这个担子。当时墨西哥室内五人制足球联盟的主席 Rafael Castillo 表示墨西哥只需要一桶油漆和一把刷子就够了，因为国内的当时的硬件规格只有十六年历史（为 1970 年世界杯所建造的）。国际足总在 1956 年举行高峰会以决定 1962 年世界杯的主办国。智利的体育主管 Carlos Dittborn 以精彩的演说为他的国家赢得了这项荣耀，他说：「我们什么都没有，所以我们希望做到一切。」

香港 — 中国长沙市规划局原副局长顾湘陵12月10日在湖南省一家法院受审，他被指控敛财7千万元人民币。顾湘陵腐败案是受他的情妇的牵连而案发的。 湖南省衡阳市中级法院星期一公开开庭审理顾湘陵案，称这是该法院迄今为止审理涉案金额最大的一起官员职务犯罪案。 顾湘陵和他的妻子吴利君被指控涉嫌犯有受贿罪。顾湘陵被指控在担任长沙市规划局局长助理、副局长期间，利用职务之便，共收取49人的贿赂。

印度总理辛格1月13日抵达北京对中国进行为期三天的访问。这是印度总理在最近的五年里第一次访问中国。分析人士认为，随着两个人口大国经济的迅速发展，中印两国势必要在各个领域加强交流与合作。 *出任总理以来首次访华* 印度总理辛格的这次访华，是辛格自2004年出任总理以来的首次访华，也是印度总理在最近五年里对中国进行的首次访问。按照访问计划，辛格将会晤中国国家主席胡锦涛、人大常委会委员长吴邦国和国务院总理温家宝，讨论联合国的改革、全球气候变化、能源安全、国际贸易及民用核领域合作等问题。 最近几年，中印双方高层领导人之间的交流显著加强。中国总理温家宝2005年访问印度，双方宣布建立旨在实现和平和繁荣的战略合作夥伴关系。
